sentences.sContent: Demonstrators were hurling bricks through the windows.
sentences.sCn: 示威者在向窗里掷砖块。

sentences.sContent: He hurled a chair across the set, smashing lamps and vases.
sentences.sCn: 他抓起一把椅子扔向片场的那头，把灯和花瓶都砸得粉碎。

synos.tran: 丢下；用力投掷；愤慨地说出

trans.tranCn: 用力投掷； 大声叫骂
trans.tranOther: to throw something with a lot of force, especially because you are angry
